GSD.description:
hamradio: defer ax25 kfree after unregister_netdev

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.295 by commit 8a1a314965a17c62084a056b4f2cb7a770854c90. For more details please see the references link.
